00032 using std::vector;

00035 class PackageIndex
00036 {
00037 public:
00038   PackageIndex();
00039   ~PackageIndex();
00040   bool Save(xmlNodePtr parentNode) const;
00041   bool Load(xmlNodePtr packageIndexNode);
00042   Package* GetPackage(string revision);
00043   Package* GetMostCurrentPackage(const PackageDependency *dependency=NULL);

00051   string mPackageName;
